text: Veikko Suominen (May 5, 1948, Rauma, Finland - December 21, 1978, Tampere Finland) was an ice hockey player who played in the SM-liiga for Upon Pallo, Kiekko-67 and Ilves from 1967 to 1978. ==Death== Suominen committed suicide on December 21, 1978 while a member of the Tampere-based team Ilves. After his death, Ilves took his jersey number, 24, out of use immediately and it has not been assigned since. Category:1948 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Ilves players Category:Ice hockey players who committed suicide Category:Finnish ice hockey forwards
title: Veikko Suominen
